content.rendered: 8 channel, 80Mbps, Max 6MP, 4ch 1080P live-view&playback, 1 VGA/1 HDMI, 1 RJ45(100M), 2 USB2.0, 1/1ch audio in/out, 1 HDD(up to 6TB), Easy4ip
